## Featured Work
_Select a category from the ones below to filter the projects._ 

_Click on "All" to remove the filters._

****
:::


<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
  // 1. Find the category box (currently hiding in the sidebar)
  var categories = document.querySelector(".quarto-listing-category");
  
  // 2. Find the main list of projects
  var projectList = document.querySelector("#listing-listing"); 

  // 3. Move the categories!
  if (categories && projectList) {
    // Insert categories BEFORE the project list starts
    projectList.parentNode.insertBefore(categories, projectList);
    
    // 4. Style them to look like a horizontal menu
    categories.style.display = "flex";
    categories.style.flexWrap = "wrap";
    categories.style.gap = "10px"; /* Space between buttons */
    categories.style.marginBottom = "1.5rem"; /* Space below the buttons */
    categories.style.marginTop = "1rem"; 
    
    // Optional: Reset any sidebar-specific widths
    categories.style.width = "100%";
  }
});
</script>
